title: Drawing, "Designs for Mechanical Furniture: Two Washstands", ca. 1805
medium: Pen and black ink, brush and watercolor on paper
creditline: Purchased for the Museum by the Advisory Council
description: Two combination washstands and bidets, each with plan, section and elevation. One shown in plan and elevation only; the other shown in elevation, plan and twice in cross-section.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Designs for Mechanical Furniture: Two Washstands", ca. 1805.
ca. 1805. Pen and black ink, brush and watercolor on paper. Purchased for the Museum by the Advisory Council. 1911-28-485.
